title: Marcello's Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local pizza bar offering some veggie pizzas as well 8 or so vegan pizzas with vegan cheese using house-made cashew cheese or Daiya brand (on request). Vegan garlic bread available on request along with a daily special pasta or risotto which can be veganized. Low light atmosphere with nice furnishings.
